tool_description: Deploy AI-Powered modules to prevent payment fraud
title: Greip

api_list.name: /BINLookup
api_list.description: This method helps you validate any BIN/IIN number and retrieve the full details related to the bank, brand, type, scheme, country, etc.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: bin
parameters.description: The BIN/IIN you want to lookup/validate.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

utterances.utterance: Can you validate the BIN number 489022 using my API key?
I need to check the details for BIN 123456 with my API key.
Please provide the bank details for BIN 654321 using my API key.
Lookup the BIN 987654 with my API key and return the information in JSON format.
Can you tell me the card type for BIN 112233 using my API key?
I want to verify the BIN 445566 with my API key.
Check the issuing country for BIN 778899 using my API key.
What is the brand associated with BIN 334455? Use my API key for the lookup.
Retrieve the scheme details for BIN 667788 using my API key.
Can you validate BIN 998877 and provide the details in JSON format with my API key?

api_list.name: /badWords
api_list.description: badWords endpoint: Detects whether user inputs contain profanity or not.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text you want to check.
parameters.default: This is a sample text without profanity!

parameters.name: scoreOnly
parameters.description: Set to `yes` to return only the score of the text and whether it's safe or not.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: listBadWords
parameters.description: Set to `yes` to list the bad-words as an Array.

utterances.utterance: Check if the text 'I hate this stupid thing!' contains any profanity.
Analyze the text 'You are an amazing person!' for any bad words.
Is the text 'This is a damn mess!' safe or not?
List any bad words found in the text 'What the heck is going on here?'

parameters.text: What the heck is going on here?

utterances.utterance: Check the text 'You are such a jerk!' for profanity and return the result in JSON format.
Does the text 'This is absolutely ridiculous!' contain any offensive language?
Evaluate the text 'I can't believe this nonsense!' for any bad words.
Check if 'You are a wonderful friend!' is free of profanity.
Analyze 'This is a freaking disaster!' and list any bad words found.
Determine if the text 'I love this place!' is safe or not.

api_list.name: /validatePhone
api_list.description: This method can be used as an extra-layer of your system for validating phone numbers.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format of the country code of the phone number.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The Phone Number you want to validate.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

utterances.utterance: Can you validate the phone number 9876543210 in India using my API key?
Please check if the phone number 5551234567 is valid in the US with my API key.
Validate the phone number 0712345678 in the UK using my API key.
Is the phone number 0412345678 valid in Australia? Use my API key to check.
Check the validity of the phone number 0123456789 in Germany with my API key.
Can you confirm if 0912345678 is a valid phone number in Japan using my API key?
Please validate the phone number 0612345678 in France with my API key.
Is 0812345678 a valid phone number in Italy? Use my API key to verify.
Check if the phone number 0912345678 is valid in Brazil using my API key.
Can you validate the phone number 0212345678 in South Africa with my API key?

api_list.name: /BulkLookup
api_list.description: BulkLookup endpoint: Returns the geolocation data of multiple IP Addresses.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: ips
parameters.description: The IP Addresses you want to lookup. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The modules you want to use of the request. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Used to inform the API to retrieve the response in your native language.

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the geolocation data for IPs 192.168.1.1 and 10.0.0.1 using my API key?
I need the location details for IP addresses 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4 in JSON format.
Fetch the geolocation for IPs 123.45.67.89 and 98.76.54.32 with currency module.
Get the geolocation data for IPs 172.16.0.1 and 172.16.0.2 in Arabic.
Retrieve geolocation for IPs 203.0.113.1 and 203.0.113.2 using my API key.
Can you look up the geolocation for IPs 192.0.2.1 and 192.0.2.2 with the default settings?
Please provide the geolocation data for IPs 198.51.100.1 and 198.51.100.2 in XML format.
I need the geolocation information for IPs 203.0.113.3 and 203.0.113.4 with currency and timezone modules.
Fetch the geolocation for IPs 198.51.100.3 and 198.51.100.4 in English.
Get the geolocation data for IPs 192.0.2.3 and 192.0.2.4 using the default API key.

api_list.name: /IPLookup
api_list.description: Returns the geolocation data of a specific IP Address.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP Address you want to lookup.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The modules you want to use of the request. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Used to inform the API to retrieve the response in your native language.

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the geolocation data for the IP address 192.168.1.1 using my API key 12345abcde?
I need the location details for IP 8.8.8.8 with my API key 67890fghij.
Fetch the geolocation information for IP 172.16.0.1 using the API key abcdef123456.
Get the geolocation data for IP 10.0.0.1 with my API key zyxwvu98765 and return it in XML format.
Please provide the geolocation details for IP 203.0.113.5 using API key 1122334455 and include currency information.
I want to know the location of IP 198.51.100.10 with my API key 5566778899, and I need the response in French.
Can you look up the geolocation for IP 192.0.2.25 using my API key 9988776655 and return the data in JSON format?
Retrieve the geolocation information for IP 203.0.113.45 with API key 123abc456def and include timezone data.
Get the location data for IP 198.51.100.20 using my API key 789xyz123abc, and I want the response in Spanish.
Please fetch the geolocation for IP 192.0.2.50 with API key 321cba654fed and include both currency and timezone information.

api_list.name: /Country
api_list.description: Country endpoint: Returns the information of a specific country by passing the `countrCode`.

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The Country Code of the country you want to fetch it's data.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Used to inform the API to retrieve the response in your native language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The modules you want to use of the request. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

utterances.utterance: Can you provide information about the country with the code US using my API key?
Fetch details for the country code CA with my API key.
I need data on the country with code GB, using my API key.
Retrieve information for country code AU in JSON format with my API key.
Get the country details for code IN using my API key and response in English.
Provide information about the country with code DE, using my API key and return in XML format.
Can you get the data for country code JP with my API key and include language module?
Fetch the country information for code FR using my API key and response in French.
I need the details for the country with code BR, using my API key and return in JSON format.
Retrieve the information for country code IT with my API key and include currency module.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Used to inform the API to retrieve the response in your native language.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The modules you want to use of the request. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

api_list.name: /validateEmail
api_list.description: This method can be used as an extra-layer of your system for validating email addresses.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The Email Address you want to validate.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

utterances.utterance: Can you validate the email address john.doe@example.com using my API key 12345abcde?

api_list.name: /ASNLookup
api_list.description: ASNLookup endpoint: This method helps you lookup any AS Number. It returns the type, organisation details, routes, etc.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: asn
parameters.description: The AS Number you want to lookup

parameters.name: isList
parameters.description: Set this to true if you want to list all routes of both IPv4 and IPv6.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

utterances.utterance: Can you provide details for AS Number 15169 using my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899?
I need to lookup AS Number 12345 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899.
Fetch the organisation details for AS Number 45678 using API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899.
List all routes for AS Number 78901 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and set the response format to JSON.
Using API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899, lookup AS Number 23456 and list all routes.
Retrieve the type and organisation for AS Number 34567 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899.
Can you get the AS Number 56789 details using API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and return the data in JSON format?
Please lookup AS Number 67890 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and list all IPv4 and IPv6 routes.
I want to know the routes for AS Number 89012 using API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899.
Get the details for AS Number 90123 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and ensure the response is in JSON.
